title: MS/PhD application help
content:
Hi everybody, 
I'm currently a PhD student. I graduated from my master's in 2024. I worked extensively on my master's application in 2021 and 2022. I also had a small startup where I worked with other people on developing a good strategy for their applications. We worked on business school and engineering school applications for about 15-16 people. I've also worked on PhD applications for about five people, including myself. 

I have time in the weekends to help a few people with their masters and general inputs on higher studies. 

If this could be something that's useful to you please reach out. 

PS - I posted earlier about this but I realized a bunch of questions are coming up about applications and higher studies.

comments.body: r u a grad from PES ?

Hey there, I am  applying for masters right now for the fall of this year, so can you give me some advice on things that can help, right now I have applied to a bunch of unis on the regular deadline and I am still waiting on the reply from them.
